com.ociweb.pronghorn.pipe

Class ChannelReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.ociweb.pronghorn.pipe.ChannelReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextReader, Closeable, DataInput, ObjectInput, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataInputBlobReader

    public abstract class ChannelReader
extends InputStream
implements ObjectInput, TextReader
